data.why:
some modules I am using very often. At first I have got 3 modules.
    2 of them provide methods to access what is called "member
    variables" in other languages. By now they are called
    Opis::GetSet::HASH and Opis::GetSet::GLOB. But I want to rename them
    to something like Class::HASH. If used as "use Class::HASH qw/m1 m2
    m3/;" they generate the functions m1, m2, m3 in the calling package.
    Class::HASH can be used if the object is represented as a HASH
    reference, Class::GLOB if it is a GLOB ref.

    The 3rd module is a template processor.
